item.description:
Hi Ladies-
MiniBar has "happy hour" Monday - Thursday and they serve $2 Mini Kobe Beef Burgers! They say there is a limit although not indicated as to what this limit is on the site. I looked at their drink menu (which is not discounted during 5-7pm) but the drinks seem good. It has been a while since I have been MiniBar but the scene is really nice.

I am not a Monday night out person. Tuesday - Thursday's are good! I am out of work by 4:30pm the latest and can head over to the venue afterwards. Also, I can see if they will allow reservations but really do not see that happening as it is a smaller venue.
item.how_to_find_us: Call or Text Me but I will Check-In with updated information as to what to look for :)
item.name: Happy Hour @ MiniBar
